name: Kostic Pecikoza Law Office
description: Kostic Pecikoza Law Office is a law firm based in Belgrade, Serbia. We are specialized in the field of corporate law, mergers and acquisitions, banking and finance, real estate, energy, infrastructure and PPP, competition, employment, dispute resolution, tax, intellectual property, data protection and privacy, and public procurement. We are committed to providing our clients with the highest quality legal services and to maintaining the highest standards of professional ethics and integrity. We are dedicated to understanding our clients’ needs and to working together with them to find effective solutions to their business and legal challenges.
